snippet.title: Silly Polly Beast - teaser
snippet.description:
This is the tale of Polly, a regular high school girl who must embrace her inner demon to safeguard her freedom.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1598780
Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AnjiGames
